meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of films.
meanings.sent1: The filmi actors were very talented.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the filmi music in the movie.
meanings.sent3: The filmi director accidentally spilled popcorn on the set.
meanings.sent4: The filmi atmosphere of the theater transported me to another world.
meanings.sent5: The filmi scenes were so vivid, it felt like I was part of the story.

meanings.sent1: We watched a filmi last night with friends.
meanings.sent2: The filmi was a romantic comedy set in Paris.
meanings.sent3: The kids wanted to watch a filmi instead of playing outside.
meanings.sent4: The filmi we saw had a surprising plot twist at the end.
meanings.sent5: I love going to the theater to watch a filmi on the big screen.
